Information Technology student

About Me

7 years in information Technology specialist. Assist in building, testing, and maintaining the campus standard builds for Windows systems on campus - both laptops and desktops Troubleshoot and resolve issues, as escalated from other groups in IT Customize manufactured software packages for installation in the S&T environment Perform some administration tasks related to operating systems, software, and thin clients Perform other duties as assigned
